name: WooCommerce Quote or Enquiry Contact Form 7
author: Geek Code Lab

sections.description:
This Plugin provide you options to select contact form 7 from lists, options to set a contact form 7 for product enquiry form of all your woocommerce products, set enquiry button color dynamically, text for enquiry button dynamically .

You will have the flexibility to display enquiry button for particular product and hide add to cart button on product, shop and category page.

CONTACT FORM 7

WooCommerce Quote or Enquiry Contact Form 7 plugin gives you option to set a contact form 7 forms as enquiry form with product name, id and sku.

To pass product details in contact form use field name like product-name, product-id and product-sku.

Use fields like below in contact form 7:
* For Product ID: use [text product-id]
* For Product Name: use [text product-name]
* For Product SKU: use [text product-sku]

DYNPMIC ENQUIRY BUTTON COLOR

WooCommerce Quote or Enquiry Contact Form 7 plugin gives you the option to set enquiry button color for all woocommerec product.

DYNPMIC ENQUIRY BUTTON TEXT

WooCommerce Quote or Enquiry Contact Form 7 plugin gives you the option to set enquiry button text as per your requirement like Send Enquiry, Enquire Now, Product Enquiry.

Also works with WordPress Multisite installs (each blog from the network has it’s own maintenance settings).

Note: This plugins is supported for only simple product

Plugin Features

  • Set up product enquiry form popup from contact form 7 forms list
  • Set up enquiry button color as per your theme main color requirement
  • Options to set up enquiry button text as per your requirement
  • Include “enquiry” button to specific product category and tags
  • You can pass product details like product id, sku and name in contact form 7
  • Manually have option to set product enquiry button for particular product
  • Manually disable enquiry button for specific product
  • Manually disable enquiry button for Guest user
  • Manually disable enquiry button for single product page
  • Manually disable enquiry button for shop page
  • Manually have option to set product enquiry button for particular product category and tag

You can use shortcode

Whenever you need to show the enquiry button on a custom page or in a specific place of the page, you can rely on this shortcode:

[wqoecf_button_quote]

Make sure you enter the product’s ID with the parameter “product” to link the button to the right product in your WooCommerce. For example: [wqoecf_button_quote product=”1234″] will let your users add product with ID 1234 to the cart.

However, it is not necessary to enter the product ID when using the shortcode on a standard WooCommerce product page, as it will automatically link the button to the product it belongs to.
sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

After Plugin Active go to WooCommerce-> Quote Or Enquiry Contact Form 7.

To pass product details in contact form use field name like product-name, product-id and product-sku. For example: add [text product-name] in contact form.

sections.reviews:
change the appearance of the button text

By abuklet73 on June 29, 2023

You cannot change the appearance of the button text. The set look looks like a blurred font.
Is change possible?

Pull the price

By Monyane Ramollo (monyane) on October 7, 2022

Can get the price displayed on the form?

great customer support

By iboyleo on May 9, 2022

this one is exactly what i need for my web, and the customer service is super fast and great, he replied my email in 5mins, it is much better than others. And it is a free plugin.

Great support for WooCommerce Quote or Enquiry Contact Form 7 plugin

By yvonnevanleeuwen on March 10, 2022

I contacted support after having an issue with the pop up enquire now form not displaying the field text. So customers couldn't enter their details for submission. Support were in contact within 10 hours (we are in New Zealand). And once initial contact was made, they resolved the issue very quickly, via our File manager. For a free plugin, this level of support is unbelievable. Thanks so much! Note, I use Divi theme, and there has been conflict with another site too. Slightly different issue, but suggest anyone with Divi might want to look at their divi/options/general/performance/defer jquery and jquery migrate toggles. Disabling this toggle resolved one long term issue.

Does this button has a shortcode

By mikeokolie on December 20, 2021

Does this button has a shortcode, am creating a custom product page.

No ideal

By Toxic (A.V.K) on January 10, 2021

Plugin works with WP5.6 but it has no very well moments. 1. Plugin allow add from last 4 forms only. 2. Form doesn't close by default. 3. Plugin doesn't have turn on at catalog mode and no specific mail-tag for products.

Awesome Plugin Enquiry work done

By ashwiniyng on July 10, 2020

It solved my Product enquiry issue and plugin is also lightweight. Few things I would like to suggest 1. Is it possible to remove the dependency on ajax.php for form (post/product tile) 2. Add option to remove mail image just before enquiry button text. 3. Replace form close.png image with bold text "X" (this will reduce 1 more request) If anyone would like to remove mail image before button text, Use below CSS. a.wqoecf_enquiry_button:before { content: none; background-image: none; } This will remove the loading of the mail.png image completely.

Works good but cant scroll up or down

By multidutch on June 11, 2020

When i add a contact form which is fairly long, i cant scroll in the lightbox that opens after clicking the button, and that is the one specific thing im searching for

Multilanguage

By adonisgeamanu on June 6, 2020

Works great for small sites but needs an template for translate in another language.

Not suitable for Variable Products

By bredamcguigan on May 21, 2020

Works ok for Simple products but it needs to say on the plugin description it is not suitable for Variable Products, wasted a lot of time before I noticed this.
